DOC.brief_summary: Intervention investigate efficacy nutritional supplement among ARV-naïve , asymptomatic HIV positive patient CD4 count range 300-550 cells/ul .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Nutrition Intervention HIV/AIDS Infected Patients
DOC.detailed_description: To investigate efficacy nutritional supplement among ARV-naïve , asymptomatic HIV positive patient CD4 count range 300-550 cells/ul . A total 120 participant stratified age gender randomly assign two treatment arm . Sixty ( 60 ) participant assign receive dietary counsel multivitamin/mineral supplement , sixty ( 60 ) additionally receive oral Medical Nutritional Supplement ( MNS ) . Participants follow six month post-randomization : baseline , 3 month 6 month . The principal outcome measure Body Mass Index , use proxy 'nutritional status ' . Secondary outcome measure include immune status antioxidant status .
DOC.criteria: HIV positive individual age range 18 50 year . Individuals whose CD4 count 300550 cells/uL . Individuals meet study criterion interested enrol . Individuals ARV therapy . Women pregnant . On clinician 's advice , individual could exclude enrollment . Individuals unable carry study intervention e.g . homeless , impaired mental state etc . Individuals unlikely complete followup base preenrolment assessment .
